Definition.WordDefinition: Midwest, WY (town, FIPS 52445) Location: 43.41132 N, 106.27753 W Population (1990): 495 (252 housing units) Area: 1.1 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 82643

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Midwest \Midwest\ n. The north central region of the U. S.
Syn: Middle West. [WordNet 1.5]
Midwest n : the north central region of the United States (sometimes called the heartland or the breadbasket of America) [syn: {Middle West}]
